select SOCIO.IdSocio as idSocio, SOCIO.Direccion as direccion, PERSONA.Nombres as nombres, PERSONA.ApePaterno as apellidoPaterno, PERSONA.ApeMaterno as apellidoMaterno, PERSONA.TipoDocumento as tipoDocumento, PERSONA.NumeroDocumento as numeroDocumento, MEMBRESIA.FechaInicio as fechaInicio, MEMBRESIA.Vitalicio as vitalicio from SOCIO, PERSONA, MEMBRESIA
SOCIO.IdSocio=PERSONA.IdPersona and (PERSONA.nombres like #{nombres})
AND (PERSONA.ApePaterno like #{apellidoPaterno})
AND (PERSONA.ApePaterno like #{apellidoPaterno})
AND SOCIO.Direccion like #{direccion}
AND PERSONA.TipoDocumento like #{tipoDocumento}
AND MEMBRESIA.IdSocio=SOCIO.IdSocio and MEMBRESIA.Estado='Activo'

select MEMBRESIA.IdSocio as codigo, MEMBRESIA.IdMembresia as membresia, MEMBRESIA.FechaInicio as fechaInicio, MEMBRESIA.Estado as estado, MEMBRESIA.Vitalicio as vitalicio from MEMBRESIA where MEMBRESIA.IdSocio like #{codigo}
